text:
At Pinterest, we're a
rapidly growing company.
We serve 482 million users every month

and in order to deliver
that inspiration to Pinners,

we want to make sure
that our infrastructure
can hold up to deliver that inspiration.

Pinterest is interested in
providing the latest innovation
for engineers, while at the same time

becoming a responsible company
on a sustainable level.

AWS is familiar with the
complexity of the Pinterest stack

and so whenever we're
posed with a challenge,

we know that we can
confidently move forward

with the solution because we
have AWS with us along the way.
Through our adoption of AWS Graviton,
we're able to do more with less.
We get more performance.

We get cost efficiency and we
have the ability to do that
by reducing our carbon footprint.

In this year alone, we
were able to adopt Graviton
from 1%-17% fleet-wide in Pinterest.
Running our infrastructure on Graviton,
we can provide top-of-line performance
and availability for Pinterest,

so the site is up and running,
always providing inspiration
for Pinners to create a life they love.

Building on AWS with Pinterest
is giving us the flexibility

to have the latest and
greatest in technology,

the support of a wonderful
best-in-class AWS team
behind us along the way,

and a fearlessness of approaching
any challenge together.
